h1_title: How to Unlock the Chapter 1 Secret Area
content: Follow this path down and past the river until you loop underneath the bridge you just crossed. Stick to the path until you reach the open area with the bamboo, and look for the path straight up ahead.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'How_to_Unlock_the_Chapter_1_Secret_Area.md', within the main section titled 'How to Unlock the Chapter 1 Secret Area', specifically from the subsection 'Bell 2'.
The content is as follows:
Follow this path down and past the river until you loop underneath the bridge you just crossed. Stick to the path until you reach the open area with the bamboo, and look for the path straight up ahead.
